title: Is Crypto at a Turning Point?
description: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are struggling as the Fed tightens monetary policies. Daren Fonda, crypto and finance editor at Barron's, and Chris Kuiper, director of research at Fidelity Digital Assets discuss what's next for digital assets in a tougher market for tech.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are struggling as the Fed tightens monetary policies. Daren Fonda, crypto and finance editor at Barron's, and Chris Kuiper, director of research at Fidelity Digital Assets discuss what's next for digital assets in a tougher market for tech.
